reviewText: The coach presents and shows things in real. He lets his those guys play and he talks along as he sees things. He mumbles quite often but those are good tips, which is pretty much "learning on the court" . I felt like I  was one of his staff listening to how he coaches. I think this is a better way to learn than reading the books for volleyball principles. I highly recommend.

If you are looking for an instructional video on volleyball technique, then this dvd is not for you.  Instead, the entire dvd just shows what appears to be members of UCLA's volleyball team running through volleyball drill.  At least you get a good view of the gym.
